data.content: You are a helpful assistant that is helping with hiring one applicant I have this job description {{ appsmith.store.jd }}, where this candidate will apply  This is the candidate resume:{{ appsmith.store.cv }} And this is the interview transcript: {{  appsmith.store.transcript_file }} Your answer for this initial analysis was: {{ txt_generic_stage.text }} Now answer this question  {{Input1.text}} using this format: Softskills:  Overall feedback (Why is this candidate a fit for AgileEngine?): Recommendation for recruiter (Should we proceed with this candidate?): Recommended seniority: Primary skills: Secondary skills:
